item.title: Can u host a server with
item.dc:creator: @quest_rs quest rs
item.description:
@quest_rs wrote:

Just download Hamachi, set up a network, and advertise. Tell them the following:
Network name
Password
IP Address (THE ONE THAT APPEARS UNDERNEATH YOUR USERNAME ON HAMACHI)

For others to play, they must join your network and than use the IP to logon

Read full topic
